item.title: The Sound and the Fury
item.description: [whitebox] Hey all, Ernie here with a piece from Andrew Egan about a specific kind of movie magicâ€”the kind you hear, whether during a dramatic fall or the crack of a whip. Enjoy! [big]Today in Tedium: Returning to my sunny little Brooklyn apartment a few weeks ago, I heard a familiar sound coming from my living room. It wasn’t music or dialogue but the second I heard it, I knew exactly what one of my roommates was watching in our living room.
